message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $1150000 for the product. This offer is valid for the next 3 rounds, and I look forward to your response.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. This is a fair price considering the value you mentioned the product has to you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I would like to propose an adjusted price of $1100000. This offer is valid for the next 2 rounds. I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of our businesses.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll be getting from the product.

I understand your position, Bob. In light of this, I would like to propose a price of $1050000 for the product. This offer is valid for the next round only. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll be getting from it.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I appreciate your revised offer. In consideration of the value of the product and our ongoing negotiation, I would like to propose a final price of $1025000. This offer is valid for this round only. I hope this brings us closer to reaching a mutually satisfactory agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm at my limit. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to consider buying from another supplier.

I understand your final offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product to your business, I am willing to accept $995000 as the final price for the product. This offer is valid until the end of this round. I hope this concludes our negotiations satisfactorily.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts, but I'm not willing to pay more than $990000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to consider buying from another supplier.
